member.name: T:Viev.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Viev.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Viev.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: M:Viev.Enumeration.EnumDescConverter.GetEnumDescription(System.Enum)
member.summary: Gets Enum Value's Description Attribute This function calls GetEnumDescript(Type,String)
member.param: The value you want the description attribute for
member.returns: The description, if any, else it's .ToString()

member.name: M:Viev.Enumeration.EnumDescConverter.GetEnumDescription(System.Type,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the description for certaing named value in an Enumeration
member.param: The name of the Enumeration value
member.returns: The description, if any, else the passed name

member.name: M:Viev.Enumeration.EnumDescConverter.GetEnumValue(System.Type,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the value of an Enum, based on it's Description Attribute or named value
member.param: The description or name of the element
member.returns: The value, or the passed in description, if it was not found

member.name: M:Viev.Relational.iObjectRelationalMap`1.Save(System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Used to save the relevant Object/s to the database.
member.param: If True then simply adds the record/s, rather than first checking to see if the record/s already exist.
